name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) with 13+ years of experience enhancing application performance within the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Kubernetes**, **Ansible**, and **Linux**, driving operational excellence via robust **CI/CD** practices and tools such as **FluxCD**, **ArgoCD**, and **Github Actions**. Skilled in monitoring and observability using **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **Loki**, ensuring system reliability and performance.
Experienced in implementing cyber security measures aligned with **ISO 27001**, and well-versed in compliance-driven development, adhering to standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Solid programming expertise in **Python** and a strong foundation in project management, possessing hands-on experience in both frontend and backend technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Additionally, I bring a strong background in AI/ML, driving innovative solutions with predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing.
